attributes.action: Prevent the proliferation of onshore wind farms in Lincolnshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many areas of unique and beautiful countryside are being threatened by the construction of wind power stations. These will have an adverse impact on wildlife, quality of life, tourism and property values - for no reason, when there are many possible offshore sites

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Lincolnshire County Council.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
